channel.title: Add a requirement

item.title: Add a requirement
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Or just shorten it.

if ((objectID == 7273) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3506) && playerLevel[1] >= 63) { triggerTele(2611, 3399, 0); sM("You have gone to the Great guild of Fishing."); } else { sM("you need higher level!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Add a requirement
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

if ((objectID == 7273) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3506) && playerLevel[1] >= 63) {
triggerTele(2611, 3399, 0);
sM(“You have gone to the Great guild of Fishing.”);
} else if ((objectID == 7273) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3506) && playerLevel[1] <= 62) {
sM(“you need higher level!”);
}

try that?

It’s not a command, it’s a portal.

item.title: Add a requirement
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“home”) && playerLevel[1] >= 63) {
triggerTele(2611, 3399, 0);
sM(“You have gone to the Great guild of Fishing.”);
} else if (command.startsWith(“home”) && playerLevel[1] <= 62) {
sM(“you need higher level!”);
}

my best gues lol

item.title: Add a requirement
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

How would I add a requirement to this teleportation.

if ((objectID == 7273) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3506)) { triggerTele(2611, 3399, 0); sM("You have gone to the Great guild of Fishing."); }

I’m taking a guess here. I know it sucks, but commands are one of my weakest points.

if ((objectID == 7273) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3506)) {
				if((playerLevel[1] > 63 =true
triggerTele(2611, 3399, 0);
sM("You have gone to the Great guild of Fishing.");
If = false
sM("You need 63 Fishing to teleport to the Guild of Fishing.")			
}

Read full topic
